title: My Dearest Boss
overview: Yu Xing Chui's life has always been filled with misfortunes, but her fate begins to change from this moment!One day she was working overtime at a company when she unexpectedly received a mysterious phone call that she was suddenly inheriting her aunt's estate.On the first night of her stay at the mansion, Yu Xing Chui was so excited that she mistakenly entered the wrong door and got into the house of her new neighbor, who turned out to be her boss Liu Yuan An.
